extensionDesc.message: Easily log your PHP data values and get errors, warnings, payload, cookies, and session data messages.

userTokenDesc1.message: Please insert your user token to retrieve your active projects.

userTokenDesc2.message: You can find your user token in the Account section of the bcons website.

userTokenAuthError.message:
User token not found.:
  • Please check that you have entered the token as displayed in the Account section of the bcons website.
  • Your account may have been suspended by an administrator of your company, please reach out to the individual in charge of bcons accounts at your company.

userInactiveError.message: Your user account is inactive. Please reach out to the individual in charge of bcons accounts at your company.

projectsListIntro.message: This is a list of the projects you are assigned to. Debug will be activated on any domain assigned to a project.
